title: Virtual Environment Simulation-Based Nursing Practice Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Utilizes smartphone-accessible WebGL environment simulations to address lack of in-person practical opportunities and support repetitive learning

learning_goals: Perform patient status assessment and emergency care procedures with 80% accuracy in a virtual simulation environment.
Improve critical thinking and decision-making skills by 30% through simulation-based case analysis.
Achieve over 85% performance in formative assessments (quizzes, scenario tests) provided by the online learning platform.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
